Subjects negative virology profile ( hepatitis B surfaceantigen hepatitis C virus antibody ) confirm 21 day prior study commencement . Females childbearing potential document negative urine pregnancy test lactate try become pregnant course study . They use adequate method contraception . A female nonchildbearing potential define one postmenopausal least 12 month , surgically sterilise , hysterectomy least 3 month prior study start . Subjects evidence history clinically significant hepatic renal disorder , cardiovascular , respiratory , metabolic , immunological , neurological , psychiatric gastrointestinal disease . Subjects history asthma allergic skin rash relevant allergic reaction . Subjects know hypersensitivity intolerance drug general . Subjects history alcohol abuse ( 28 unit per week male 21 unit female ) . Subjects test positive hepatitis B surfaceantigen hepatitis C virus antibody . Subjects course prescribed drug treatment within 28 day study start approve Principal Investigator . Subjects take counter ( OTC ) drug , vitamin , herbal remedy use topically applied preparation within one week study start unless Principal Investigator give approval .
